survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from participants about their experience with our recent webinar, including content quality, engagement, and technical aspects.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall content of the webinar?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly radio buttons.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall content of the webinar?

questions.question_text: Which topics covered in the webinar did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-selection. Ensure checkboxes are clearly labeled.

script.question_text: Which topics covered in the webinar did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the webinar presenter's knowledge and delivery?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point scale. Ensure clarity in options.

script.question_text: How would you rate the webinar presenter's knowledge and delivery?

questions.question_text: Were there any technical issues you encountered during the webinar?
questions.client_notes: Binary response. Follow-up with Q5 if 'Yes' is selected.

script.question_text: Were there any technical issues you encountered during the webinar?

questions.question_text: Please describe the technical issues you experienced:
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture detailed feedback. Ensure mobile-friendly text input.

script.question_text: Please describe the technical issues you experienced:

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future webinars?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather constructive feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-ended text input with character limit.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future webinars?
